statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{19 \, x^{3} + 31 \, x^{2} + 23 \, x + 18 , -5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 3 , 3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 1 , -6 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3 , -5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
